item.title: A Lost Friend
item.description: 3 years ago, One of Myrrdin’sMyrrdin’s closest friends TherapyddTherapydd, set off on his own A’lawdrinaiethA’lawdrinaieth leaving off of The Forlorn ShiverThe Forlorn Shiver never to be seen again.

item.title: A Search in the Stars
item.description: Myrrdin’sMyrrdin’s uncle NikephorosNikephoros completed his own A’lawdrinaiethA’lawdrinaieth nearly 12 years ago by scaling the sheer cliffs that line the edge of the The Forlorn ShiverThe Forlorn Shiver until he reached the very bottom, scraping against sky itself.

item.title: A Strange Encounter at Depths
item.description: MyrrdinMyrrdin and TherapyddTherapydd (His friend that disappeared 3 years ago on his A’lawdrinaiethA’lawdrinaieth) were close friends for all though their childhood.

item.title: Hide and Seek
item.description: MyrrdinMyrrdin learned a little from the crewcrew of the airship that he landed on. The human empire lives on a far away shardshard known has HearthenHearthen.
